alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 232 PM EDT/132 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek to 8 miles northeast of Mexico Beach. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Callaway, Springfield, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Nixon, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Bay Harbor, College Station, Bayou George, Overstreet, Youngstown, Cairo, Kinard, Brannonville, Broad Branch, Millville, Wetappo and Majette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
